original: @115b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @115b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: tsitta ko sha aa badzra g'i ti /
analyzed: tsitta ko sha aa badzra g'i ti /
translated: Cittako≈õƒÅvajradƒ´ti

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: thugs kyi mdzod skye med rdo rje'i glu /
analyzed: thugs kyi mdzod skye med rdo rje'i glu /
translated: The Song of the Unborn Vajra Treasury of the Mind

original: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the youthful Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´.

original: skye bo lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes ni //
analyzed: skye bo lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes ni //
translated: The co-emergent wisdom of beings

original: rang gi nyams su myong ba de kho na //
analyzed: rang gi nyams su myong ba de kho na //
translated: Is that very experience of one's own.

original: rig dang ma rig rang rig gsal ba de kho na //
analyzed: rig dang ma rig rang rig gsal ba de kho na //
translated: Awareness and non-awareness are the clarity of one's own awareness.

original: mar me mun gsal rang gi rang gsal rang la sad //
analyzed: mar me mun gsal rang gi rang gsal rang la sad //
translated: A lamp illuminates darkness, and one's own nature awakens to itself.

original: 'dam gyi padma 'dam la ma zhen kha dog legs //
analyzed: 'dam gyi padma 'dam la ma zhen kha dog legs //
translated: A lotus in the mud is not attached to the mud and has a beautiful color.

original: gzung 'dzin dri ma ma spangs snying po gsal //
analyzed: gzung 'dzin dri ma ma spangs snying po gsal //
translated: The essence is clear without abandoning the stains of percepts and perceivers.

original: nags khrod gnas pa'i ri dags gcig pur rgyu //
analyzed: nags khrod gnas pa'i ri dags gcig pur rgyu //
translated: A solitary deer roams in the forest.

original: rgyu la ma zhen 'bras bu de kho na //
analyzed: rgyu la ma zhen 'bras bu de kho na //
translated: Not attached to causes, the result is that very thing.

original: snang dang mi snang yul med zhen med gsal //
analyzed: snang dang mi snang yul med zhen med gsal //
translated: Appearances and non-appearances are clear without an object of attachment.

original: dngos stong ma dran dran med brjed ba med //
analyzed: dngos stong ma dran dran med brjed ba med //
translated: Empty things are not remembered, and non-memory is not forgotten.

original: lhan cig skyes pa rnam gsum nyams su bde //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa rnam gsum nyams su bde //
translated: The three co-emergences are experienced as bliss.

original: zhen pa med phyir rtog ge'i yul las 'das //
analyzed: zhen pa med phyir rtog ge'i yul las 'das //
translated: Since there is no attachment, it transcends the domain of speculation.

original: sna tshogs dran phyir rjes su 'brang ba med //
analyzed: sna tshogs dran phyir rjes su 'brang ba med //
translated: Because of the variety of memories, there is no following.

original: gsal dang mi mnyam ye shes snying po nyid //
analyzed: gsal dang mi mnyam ye shes snying po nyid //
translated: The essence of wisdom is clarity and nonuniformity.

original: mun sel nyi ma sgron me'i kha dog @116a * //
analyzed: mun sel nyi ma sgron me'i kha dog @116a * //
translated: Like the color of the sun, which dispels darkness,

original: ltar // rang rig rang la 'bar na 'dzin rtog zad //
analyzed: ltar // rang rig rang la 'bar na 'dzin rtog zad //
translated: when one‚Äôs vidyƒÅ blazes in oneself, the concepts of grasping are exhausted.

original: sgrib pa zad phyir dran med yengs pa med //
analyzed: sgrib pa zad phyir dran med yengs pa med //
translated: Because obscurations are exhausted, there is no memory and no distraction.üîΩDo not generate the conventions of duality, existence, and nonexistence.

original: gnyis dang yod med tha snyad ma skyed cig / phyag rgya chen po bsam med blo las 'das //üîΩrang rig rdo rje 'dzin pa rnal 'byor pa //
analyzed: gnyis dang yod med tha snyad ma skyed cig / phyag rgya chen po bsam med blo las 'das // rang rig rdo rje 'dzin pa rnal 'byor pa //
translated: The mahƒÅmudrƒÅ is inconceivable and beyond the intellect.

original: 'da' dka' lhan cig skyes pa'i mar me ni //
analyzed: 'da' dka' lhan cig skyes pa'i mar me ni //
translated: The lamp of the connate, difficult to transcend,

original: thabs dang shes rab zung du 'jug pa'i don //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab zung du 'jug pa'i don //
translated: is the meaning of the union of method and wisdom.

original: skye med stong pa 'od gsal ris dang bral //
analyzed: skye med stong pa 'od gsal ris dang bral //
translated: Nonarising emptiness is luminosity free from extremes.

original: khyad par can gyi ye shes kho na nyid //
analyzed: khyad par can gyi ye shes kho na nyid //
translated: The special wisdom itself

original: gnyis la mi ltos bde ba rgyun mi 'chad //
analyzed: gnyis la mi ltos bde ba rgyun mi 'chad //
translated: is the uninterrupted bliss that does not rely on a pair.

original: rang 'byung rtog med bag chags rtsad nas gcod //
analyzed: rang 'byung rtog med bag chags rtsad nas gcod //
translated: The root of the traces of concepts is severed.

original: sems can sangs rgyas khyad par bsam yas kyang //
analyzed: sems can sangs rgyas khyad par bsam yas kyang //
translated: The difference between sentient beings and buddhas is inconceivable.

original: spyod lam dag na rgyun gyi rnal 'byor che //
analyzed: spyod lam dag na rgyun gyi rnal 'byor che //
translated: When conduct is pure, the yoga of the continuum is great.

original: dran pa'i rang bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab kyang //
analyzed: dran pa'i rang bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab kyang //
translated: Although the nature of mindfulness is inconceivable,

original: gdod nas dag pas dran med dbyings la thim //
analyzed: gdod nas dag pas dran med dbyings la thim //
translated: it dissolves into the dhƒÅtu of nonmindfulness because it is pure from the beginning.

original: rang don skye med gnyis bral rtogs pa'i don //
analyzed: rang don skye med gnyis bral rtogs pa'i don //
translated: The meaning of the realization of nonarising, free from the two, is for one‚Äôs own benefit.

original: 'bras bu dag pas blo 'das yul med bral ;
analyzed: 'bras bu dag pas blo 'das yul med bral ;
translated: Since the result is pure, the transcendent state is free from an object.

original: / rtogs pa'i thabs rgyun rang bzhin kun la khyab //
analyzed: / rtogs pa'i thabs rgyun rang bzhin kun la khyab //
translated: The method of realization is the continuum that pervades all natures.

original: thabs kyi 'gro don snying rje bsam yas kyang //
analyzed: thabs kyi 'gro don snying rje bsam yas kyang //
translated: Although the benefit for migrating beings through the method is inconceivable compassion,

original: ye shes rang bzhin skye 'gag med par rtogs //
analyzed: ye shes rang bzhin skye 'gag med par rtogs //
translated: it is realized that pristine consciousness is unborn and unceasing.

original: thabs kyi bde ba skyes kyang de med ma zin 'ching //
analyzed: thabs kyi bde ba skyes kyang de med ma zin 'ching //
translated: Although the bliss of the method arises, if it is not held without that, it is a bondage.

original: grol ba'i ye shes rang la lhan cig 'byung //
analyzed: grol ba'i ye shes rang la lhan cig 'byung //
translated: The pristine consciousness of liberation arises simultaneously with oneself.

original: bsgom bya sgom byed dmigs pa'i blo las 'das //
analyzed: bsgom bya sgom byed dmigs pa'i blo las 'das //
translated: It is beyond the mind that observes the object of meditation and the meditator.

original: sangs rgyas sems can bsam gyis mi khyab pa //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sems can bsam gyis mi khyab pa //
translated: Buddhas and sentient beings are inconceivable.

original: skye med rtogs pa'i yul na blor mi snang //
analyzed: skye med rtogs pa'i yul na blor mi snang //
translated: They do not appear to the mind in the field of the realization of nonarising.

original: de nyid sad pas bde ba stong pas mtshon //
analyzed: de nyid sad pas bde ba stong pas mtshon //
translated: That is indicated by empty bliss when it awakens.

original: bsgom bya'i ngo bo snang ba'i rkyen las byung //
analyzed: bsgom bya'i ngo bo snang ba'i rkyen las byung //
translated: The essence of the object of meditation arises from the condition of appearances.

original: mi rtog rtogs pas kun rdzob tha snyad 'grub //
analyzed: mi rtog rtogs pas kun rdzob tha snyad 'grub //
translated: Nonconceptuality is realized, and relative conventions are accomplished.

original: gnyis su med pa'i snang ba rkyen med la //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i snang ba rkyen med la //
translated: In the nondual appearance that is not a condition,

original: rang bzhin dag pa skye ba'i rnam 'phrul shar //
analyzed: rang bzhin dag pa skye ba'i rnam 'phrul shar //
translated: the natural purity arises as the magical display of birth.

original: bral dang ma bral mi rtog blo las 'das //
analyzed: bral dang ma bral mi rtog blo las 'das //
translated: Free and not free are beyond the conceptual mind.

original: gnyis med rtogs byar skye med yul du 'gyur //
analyzed: gnyis med rtogs byar skye med yul du 'gyur //
translated: Nonduality is realized as the unborn object.

original: stong par smra bas de nyid rtogs mi 'gyur //
analyzed: stong par smra bas de nyid rtogs mi 'gyur //
translated: The proponents of emptiness do not realize suchness.

original: blo las 'das pas mno bsam yul ma yin//
analyzed: blo las 'das pas mno bsam yul ma yin//
translated: Beyond the mind, it is not an object of thought.

original: mtha' gsum rtag 'dod dag gis rnyed par dga' //
analyzed: mtha' gsum rtag 'dod dag gis rnyed par dga' //
translated: Those who assert the three extremes as permanent are delighted to find it.

original: dga' bzhi dag la dmigs kyang de nyid dka' //
analyzed: dga' bzhi dag la dmigs kyang de nyid dka' //
translated: Though they focus on the four delights, it is difficult for them.

original: tshogs drug rang chas ye shes mchog ldan pas //
analyzed: tshogs drug rang chas ye shes mchog ldan pas //
translated: The supreme wisdom that naturally belongs to the six sense groups

original: gnyis med bcud kyi snang ba rang la 'chad //
analyzed: gnyis med bcud kyi snang ba rang la 'chad //
translated: explains the appearance of the nondual essence to itself.

original: kye ho phyag rgya chen po rtogs bral kun gyi gzhi //
analyzed: kye ho phyag rgya chen po rtogs bral kun gyi gzhi //
translated: KYE HO. The basis of all, free from the realization of mahƒÅmudrƒÅ,

original: dngos grub 'byung @116b bas ngo mtshar rmad du che //
analyzed: dngos grub 'byung @116b bas ngo mtshar rmad du che //
translated: is marvelous and amazing because of the arising of siddhis.

original: gnyis med bag chags sad nas rang rig bral //
analyzed: gnyis med bag chags sad nas rang rig bral //
translated: After the nondual latent tendencies awaken, one is free from self-awareness.

original: gzung 'dzin bral ba'i phyag rgya chen po ni //
analyzed: gzung 'dzin bral ba'i phyag rgya chen po ni //
translated: MahƒÅmudrƒÅ is free from subject and object.

original: mtshan nyid bstan pas nyan thos la sogs skrag / rtse gcig bltas na yon tan mthar thug ldan //
analyzed: mtshan nyid bstan pas nyan thos la sogs skrag / rtse gcig bltas na yon tan mthar thug ldan //
translated: But when one-pointedly looking at it, it has ultimate qualities.

original: rtse gcig byas kyang cung zad bsgom du med//
analyzed: rtse gcig byas kyang cung zad bsgom du med//
translated: Even though one-pointed, there is not the slightest meditation.

original: rnam rtog rang 'bar dran med gsos su zhi //
analyzed: rnam rtog rang 'bar dran med gsos su zhi //
translated: The self-arising of conceptuality is nourished by nonmindfulness.

original: dran med snang med me long gzugs brnyan 'dra //
analyzed: dran med snang med me long gzugs brnyan 'dra //
translated: Nonmindfulness and nonappearance are like a reflection in a mirror.

original: tha snyad bral bas skye med blo 'das lam //
analyzed: tha snyad bral bas skye med blo 'das lam //
translated: Since it is free from conventions, it is the path of nonarising and the transcendence of the intellect.

original: mtshan ma'i dran pa dri med bag chags bstan //
analyzed: mtshan ma'i dran pa dri med bag chags bstan //
translated: The stainless mindfulness of signs is taught to be a trace.

original: thog mtha' bral zhing snga phyi'i dus mi dmigs //
analyzed: thog mtha' bral zhing snga phyi'i dus mi dmigs //
translated: Free from beginning and end, the past and future are not observed.

original: kye ho de phyir dngos med ye shes rtogs pa'i lam //
analyzed: kye ho de phyir dngos med ye shes rtogs pa'i lam //
translated: KYE HO. Therefore, the path of the realization of nonentity is pristine consciousness.

original: ji ltar bag chags bral ba'i tshul zhe na //
analyzed: ji ltar bag chags bral ba'i tshul zhe na //
translated: If it is asked how is one free from traces,

original: gnyis su ma gzung gdod mtha' bral bas zhi //
analyzed: gnyis su ma gzung gdod mtha' bral bas zhi //
translated: since it is free from the extremes of the beginning and end, it is peace.

original: bag chags bral bas phyogs med rgyu ba stong //
analyzed: bag chags bral bas phyogs med rgyu ba stong //
translated: Since it is free from traces, it is empty, moving without partiality.

original: zung du 'jug pa sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: zung du 'jug pa sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid //
translated: The essence of the buddhas is union.

original: shes rab rnam gsum yul dang thabs su gsungs //
analyzed: shes rab rnam gsum yul dang thabs su gsungs //
translated: The three kinds of wisdom are said to be the object and the method.

original: dpe dang bral bas mtshon ba'i yul las 'das //
analyzed: dpe dang bral bas mtshon ba'i yul las 'das //
translated: Since it is free from examples, it is beyond the domain of illustration.

original: skye ba 'di la dam pa'i snying po min //
analyzed: skye ba 'di la dam pa'i snying po min //
translated: In this life, it is not the essence of the sublime.

original: thabs kyi sbyor bas tshogs drug rang sar zhi //
analyzed: thabs kyi sbyor bas tshogs drug rang sar zhi //
translated: Through the application of methods, the sixfold collection is pacified in its own place.

original: phung po lnga sogs yon tan dag pa'i zhing //
analyzed: phung po lnga sogs yon tan dag pa'i zhing //
translated: The five aggregates and so on are the pure field of qualities.

original: kun mkhyen gnyis med snang yul zhen dang bral //
analyzed: kun mkhyen gnyis med snang yul zhen dang bral //
translated: The object of appearance of the nondual omniscience is free from attachment.

original: don dam smra med kun rdzob rtog ge tsam//
analyzed: don dam smra med kun rdzob rtog ge tsam//
translated: The ultimate is inexpressible; the relative is mere speculation.

original: mya ngan 'das lam 'khor ba'i snang ba nyid //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das lam 'khor ba'i snang ba nyid //
translated: The path of nirvana is the appearance of samsara itself.

original: bla ma dam pa'i dgongs pa thug phrad du //
analyzed: bla ma dam pa'i dgongs pa thug phrad du //
translated: Having encountered the transcendent state of the sublime guru,

original: rnyed nas 'khor ba'i lam las grol bar 'gyur //
analyzed: rnyed nas 'khor ba'i lam las grol bar 'gyur //
translated: one is liberated from the path of samsara.

original: rnal 'byor dgongs pa'i nyams rnyed rdzogs sangs rgyas //
analyzed: rnal 'byor dgongs pa'i nyams rnyed rdzogs sangs rgyas //
translated: The attainment of the experience of the transcendent state of yoga is perfect buddhahood.

original: ma nor lam du lhan cig kho na yin //
analyzed: ma nor lam du lhan cig kho na yin //
translated: It is only simultaneously on the unerring path.

original: kye ho gnyis med don du gsang sngags brda yis bkrol //
analyzed: kye ho gnyis med don du gsang sngags brda yis bkrol //
translated: KYE HO. The meaning of nonduality is explained with the symbols of secret mantra.

original: yon tan mi zad rgya mtsho nor bu mtshungs //
analyzed: yon tan mi zad rgya mtsho nor bu mtshungs //
translated: It is similar to an ocean of inexhaustible qualities and a jewel.

original: thabs mchog zin na bcu bzhi'i sa la gnas //
analyzed: thabs mchog zin na bcu bzhi'i sa la gnas //
translated: If the supreme method is grasped, one abides on the fourteenth stage.

original: gang du gnas kyang ye shes rang las rnyed //
analyzed: gang du gnas kyang ye shes rang las rnyed //
translated: Wherever one abides, pristine consciousness is found from oneself.

original: gter rnyed bdag gzhan gnyis ka'i don la rmongs //
analyzed: gter rnyed bdag gzhan gnyis ka'i don la rmongs //
translated: Having found the treasure, one is confused about the benefit of both oneself and others.

original: snying gi ga'u padma'i me tog dkyil //
analyzed: snying gi ga'u padma'i me tog dkyil //
translated: In the center of the lotus flower of the chest,

original: thabs dang ldan pa sbyor ba de nas 'gyed //
analyzed: thabs dang ldan pa sbyor ba de nas 'gyed //
translated: the bindu is released through the union endowed with method.

original: 'khor lo'i phyogs kyi rtsa gnas gang du yang //
analyzed: 'khor lo'i phyogs kyi rtsa gnas gang du yang //
translated: In whatever place there is a channel of the cakras,

original: 'dod dang bral bas chags med nam mkha' la //
analyzed: 'dod dang bral bas chags med nam mkha' la //
translated: free from desire, without attachment, in space,

original: gyen thur 'dren dang 'khor lo bskor ba yang //
analyzed: gyen thur 'dren dang 'khor lo bskor ba yang //
translated: the upward and downward movement and the turning of the cakras

original: thabs kyi 'dren tshul don gyi gting mi rnyed //
analyzed: thabs kyi 'dren tshul don gyi gting mi rnyed //
translated: are the method of the way of release, the ultimate is not found.

original: gzung dang 'phang dang sbyar @117a * //üîΩdang spar ba yang //
analyzed: gzung dang 'phang dang sbyar @117a * // dang spar ba yang //
translated: Grasping, holding, applying, and expelling

original: blun po dbugs mi bde dang khyad med mtshungs //
analyzed: blun po dbugs mi bde dang khyad med mtshungs //
translated: are the same as the indisposition of a fool.

original: rtogs par 'dod pas de nyid rtag tu blta //
analyzed: rtogs par 'dod pas de nyid rtag tu blta //
translated: One who wishes to realize should always look at that.

original: gus dang bas bla ma dkon mchog brten //
analyzed: gus dang bas bla ma dkon mchog brten //
translated: With devotion, rely on the guru and the Three Jewels.

original: gsang ba'i yon tan bla ma mchog las 'byung //
analyzed: gsang ba'i yon tan bla ma mchog las 'byung //
translated: The qualities of the secret arise from the supreme guru.

original: don ldan mtshan nyid nyon mongs g-yul las rgyal //
analyzed: don ldan mtshan nyid nyon mongs g-yul las rgyal //
translated: The one endowed with the meaning is victorious in the battle with afflictions.

original: gsang ba'i don nyid don dang rab ldan pa'i //
analyzed: gsang ba'i don nyid don dang rab ldan pa'i //
translated: The meaning of the secret itself is endowed with the meaning

original: bla ma slob dpon lung dang rab ldan nas //
analyzed: bla ma slob dpon lung dang rab ldan nas //
translated: through the transmission of the guru and the master.

original: mi gnyis sgo nas 'gro ba grol 'gyur shog / thugs kyi mdzod skye med rdo rje'i glu snying po gsang ba'i don /
analyzed: mi gnyis sgo nas 'gro ba grol 'gyur shog / thugs kyi mdzod skye med rdo rje'i glu snying po gsang ba'i don /
translated: May the two people who go out the door be liberated.üîΩThe essence of the secret meaning of the vajra song of the unborn mind treasure

original: dpal sa ra ha pa'i zhal nas gsungs pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: dpal sa ra ha pa'i zhal nas gsungs pa rdzogs so//
translated: is complete.
